title: Fire Threatens Iran’s Ancient Forest, a World Heritage Site
description: Iran has been battling its worst drought in more than six decades. A blaze in the north has now eaten through parts of the old treasure.

title: UN Climate Change Deal Made Without Any Mention Of Fossil Fuel—Outrage Erupts
description: A new UN climate deal has ignited global outrage after nearly 200 nations approved an agreement that triples climate finance but completely omits any mention of fossil fuels, despite overwhelming evidence of their role in accelerating the climate crisis.

title: Dining like the ancient ones
description: A real favorite of ours is Anasazi beans. We were first introduced to this unusual variety when our good friend Randy Hunsinger of Rushville came back from a long-haul delivery out West. Randy gave us two 1-pound packages of the...
